beds.name: Boling Twin Solid Wood Platform Bed with Trundle by Harriet Bee
beds.description: With a clean design and solid 100% knot-free, New Zealand pine wood construction, this Boling Twin Solid Wood Platform Bed with Trundle by Harriet Bee is built to last. Solid and stable, this bed supports kids from toddlers to teens. Kids' furniture includes bunks, storage, and trundle beds as well as tables, chairs, and storage solutions. This bed meets or exceeds federal safety standards for children's furniture.

beds.name: Bed Frame with Storage and LED Lights Charging Station, Velvet Upholstered Girl Bed with Drawer, No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assemble
beds.description:
Features

This bed frame, in high-density foam and velvet, offers a soft, cozy, breathable comfort for sweet dreams.
Practical headboard storage for books and essentials. Spacious drawers hide seasonal items and toys.
Control via panel or app. Sync lights to music/mood. **14 modes, 3 speeds, 3 brightness levels**
Low-voltage charging socket keeps your phone and smartwatch powered during leisure time in bed.

beds.name: Eriksay Low Profile Upholstered Platform Bed with Wingback Headboard
beds.description: This platform bed showcases a low-profile silhouette and clean lines for a mid-century modern look in your bedroom or guest room. The frame is built from engineered wood, and it rests on splayed legs with a light brown finish. This bed is upholstered in linen and/or velvet with a medley of colors to choose from that best suits your style. We love how the tall wingback headboard is padded with chic channel tufting, so you have a cushioned spot to relax for some late-night reading. Best of all, a box spring is not necessary. A mattress is not included. Note: The color might be affected by lighting conditions.

beds.name: Ambrosia Full Platform Bed
beds.description: Grace Kelly. Elizabeth Taylor. Audrey Hepburn. They became icons of Old Hollywood glamour with their sophisticated and feminine styles, and the Max & Finn Ambrosia Full Size Upholstered Bed captures this same easy elegance in your little starlet's room without the lavish Hollywood expense. Beautifully upholstered in faux velvet with diamond tufted detailing on the headboard, this full size bed fits a standard full size mattress (sold separately), no additional box spring or foundation required. The upholstered bed frame is solidly constructed with a wood frame and legs, making this kids' full bed the focal piece of their room that will endure as your child grows into their tween and teen years. Like the stars of Old Hollywood, The Max & Finn Full Size Upholstered Bed will charmingly take the center stage of any bedroom.

beds.name: Toddler Bed, with Removable Guard Rails, Kids Beds, Standard Crib Size, Mattress Not Included
beds.description: Give your child the gift of a cozy, safe, and stylish sleep space with our Kids' Soft Upholstered Bed. Designed with premium materials and thoughtful features, this bed is the perfect addition to any child's bedroom.

beds.name: Upholstered Storage Kids Bed With LED Lights And 4 Drawers
beds.description: This carefully crafted upholstered bed provides ultimate comfort and support for children. The wingback headboard with luxurious diamond button decoration also adds an elegant and luxurious feel to the bedroom decoration. 4 spacious storage drawers with wheels at the bottom can neatly store bedding, clothes, books and more, keeping the bedroom tidy and organized. In addition, the multi-functional LED light strip can help you create the ideal atmosphere and create the best sleeping and leisure environment for your child.

beds.name: Full Size Wood Daybed with 2 Bedside Cabinets, Upper Shelves and 4 Drawers
beds.description: If you need extra space to store toys and bedding or your daily books and home items, this daybed with bedside cabinets and upper shelves is perfect for your home. High-quality, solid pine legs and a strong, durable frame ensure stability and durability for long-term use. This daybed with Bedside Cabinet and upper shelves is designed with a clean silhouette and a hue of elegance. It gives any room a spark of style that's both modern and timeless. This daybed is designed with a clean silhouette and a hue of elegance. It suits all styles of home decoration and completes the look of any bedroom. Enjoy the relaxation of a cozy daybed with the added functionality of storage cabinets and shelves, all in one stylish piece.

beds.name: L-Shaped Corner Bed Frame With Drawer, Bookcase, Led Downlight And USB Port For Small Room,Bedroom, Guest Room
beds.description: The L-Shaped Bed Frame is a remarkable piece of furniture with multiple appealing features. It's a High Quality Daybed as all parts of its frame have undergone numerous polishings, demonstrating beautiful craftsmanship. The smooth surface ensures your fingers won't get scratched, and being made of pine wood, it's sturdy and built to last. When it comes to storage, it really shines. There are built-in storage cabinets on one side and L-shaped bookcases along two sides. These offer plenty of room for books, dolls, toys, and decorative items, allowing for orderly display and storage. The wood slats also play a crucial role in keeping mattresses in place and extending their lifespan. Its Versatile style, with modern design and simple lines, can blend effortlessly into various decoration styles, fitting well in bedrooms, studies, corner spaces, studios, or children's rooms. Moreover, assembly is a breeze. Each order includes a clear and detailed instruction guide and all necessary tools. And if you have any questions, our responsive customer service is ready to assist you promptly.

beds.name: Kids Daybed Wood Bed with Two Drawers
beds.description: Our dual-use daybed frame can be used as sofa or bed. It is a good choice for you. Most of the frame is made of premium pine wood which ensures sturdiness and durability. And the accessories come with the daybed frame are sturdy so that the bed won't make any noise and shake after you use it for many years. This twin daybed comes with two drawers ,easy to pull in and out, multi-functional piece of furniture ideal for small living spaces. And the appearance of our bed is concise and modern which can suit for any style of decoration.

beds.name: Twin Canopy Bed Frame with Upholstered Headboard & Storage, Noise Free, No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assembly
beds.description: This elegant twin canopy bed features an arched design for creative decorations, a plush Sherpa-upholstered headboard, and spacious under-bed storage. Built with a sturdy metal frame and noise-free foot pads, it requires no box spring and assembles easily for a dreamy yet functional kids' bedroom.

beds.name: Princess Bed with Storage Drawer & LED Lights, Adjustable Headboard Upholstered Platform Bed with Velvet Crystal Button Princess Bed
beds.description: Style: Gorgeous Princess Style Sizes: Twin/Full Colors: Pink/White Upholstery: Soft Velvet Storage: Underbed Drawer Additional Features: Ambient Lighting Strip The perfect gift for your girl.

beds.name: Bed Frame with Storage Headboard, Metal Platform Bed Frame with RGB Lights & Outlets
beds.description: Meet Your Dream Bed (That Does Way More Than Just Hold Your Snoring) Tired of boring beds that just... sit there? Ours is like the Swiss Army knife of sleep—stylish, smart, and packed with features to make your bedroom the ultimate chill zone. It's a bed, a storage unit, a charging hub, and a light show. Basically, the only thing it doesn't do is make your morning alarm less annoying. Upgrade from "just a bed" to "why didn't I buy this sooner?" —because you deserve to sleep (and lounge) in style.

beds.name: Dyane Upholstered Bed Full Bed Frame with Charging Station and LED Lights
beds.description: Here are three types of bed frames with 4 storage drawers. This bed frame is equipped charging station and LED lights, which makes your bedroom upgraded. The platform adopts a solid steel framework to ensure durability and stability.

beds.name: Cimahi Upholstered Twin Daybed Frame for Kids, Twin Platform Bed with Carton Ears Shaped Headboard, Wood
beds.description: This twin bed brings a playful touch to your child's bedroom with its delightful rabbit-shaped headboard. Upholstered in soft velvet, it offers a cozy backrest that's both cute and practical for bedtime stories or lounging. The bed's slatted frame is crafted from a mix of plywood and steel, providing a reliable foundation for restful nights. With 12 included slats, there's no need for a box spring, making setup a breeze. This bed is a fun addition to any kid's room, adding a dash of whimsy and comfort.

beds.name: Bed Frame For Kids With Scallop Headboard, Cute Velvet Bed For Girls, Boys, Sturdy Platform Bed
beds.description: Full Bed Frames for Kids: Girls full bed boasts an elegant cute headboard, upholstered full bed frame with headboard is filled with a high-density sponge to make it more comfortable, and the low full floor bed design is safe for kids.

beds.name: Bed Frame With Led Lights, Girls Full Bed With Princess Crown, Led Velvet Upholstered Platform Bed Frame With Adjustable Headboard, No Box Spring Needed
beds.description:
About This Product

This lovely and gorgeous princess bed for girls has a headboard made of soft and comfortable velvet fabric, which can bring you a softer and more comfortable use experience. In addition, the cute crown shape of the headboard creates a gorgeous palace atmosphere for the product as a whole. If you want to give your child a bed, this product will be your best choice.

Features

The crown-shaped headboard also has a light strip, and you can adjust the color of the light according to your preference, which can better create a princess style for your room.
The cute and soft girls full bed comes with velvet fabric and fashion princess crown providing elegant and comfort feeling.
The headboard height of this bed frame is adjustable from 48.4 inches to 50.4 inches, and you can adjust the headboard to different heights according to your needs.
This cute princess-style bed has a sturdy and stable structure and does not make any noise. The velvet soft material will also bring you a better user experience.
This princess-style soft bed will be the best gift for your child.

beds.name: Upholstered Bed Frame, Storage Bed with LED and Charging Station
beds.description: This practical bed frame combines a stylish headboard with soft velvet/linen to match any bedroom style. The headboard features a RGB LED light strip that changes color via a smartphone app while you're lying in bed, creating a cozy nighttime atmosphere. You can also set an alarm clock or make the color of the light strip change with the rhythm of the music. Please enjoy exploring its functions! When you lean against the soft and comfortable headboard, you can experience the convenience of the built-in charging port and storage places on the headboard. Whats more, this bed has extra storage drawers, with this bed you can keep away from clutter. The stable wooden bed frame can support a weight of 750-850 pounds without the need for a box spring. Simply place the mattress on it and you can start enjoying your comfortable bedroom experience! Upgrade Notice: The Full/Queen size bed has been upgraded with two-tier side storage and 2 drawers; the wood slats have been upgraded to metal slats, other sizes will be upgraded soon.

beds.name: Upholstered Kids LED Bed Frame with Storage Drawers, Princess Platform Bed with Adjustable Headboard
beds.description: Wrapped in cozy, luxurious velvet, this shell-shaped bed comes with an LED nightlight (600+ colors included, alarm clock and more) and underbed drawer storage. This velvet upholstered bed frame creates a glamorous and inviting atmosphere, making it the perfect centerpiece for a princess-themed room within bedroom furniture sets.Create a dreamy paradise bedroom with this bed and enjoy a peaceful night's sleep every night!

beds.name: Daphne Upholstered LED Bed Frame With Drawer & Adjustable Headboard, Kids Beds
beds.description: Elevate your bedroom's style with this platform bed, featuring a unique romantic curved headboard. The headboard is equipped with LED lights offering over 60,000 color variations and 5 music modes, allowing you to effortlessly create the perfect space for relaxation or atmosphere setting. Made with extremely comfortable soft velvet fabric, along with an adjustable-height headboard and high-rebound support backrest, this upholstered bed frame provides exceptional support for your body, helping to alleviate the fatigue of the day. The bed frame is reinforced with 12 solid wood slats and comes with silent strips, ensuring a stable structure while achieving a completely silent sleeping experience. A storage drawer is designed at the foot of the bed, making it convenient to store clothes, toys, pillows, and more. Whether as a surprise gift for your children or a reward for yourself in terms of comfort and style, this bed is your ideal choice. Order now and enjoy the convenience of not needing a box spring mattress.
